long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
At Focal, we recognize the untapped potential that exists in what we consume and read. We understand that true insights emerge not just from individual sources, but from a holistic birds eye-view of many.

Focal was built to be more than a read-it-later app. We wanted to combine a beautiful reading experience with powerful tools designed for navigating and synthesizing complex information. Whether it's web content or intricate documents, Focal's intelligent algorithms work behind the scenes to enhance your understanding and retention.

Focal is a position of clarity. We're here to help you find the signal in the noise.

Our Chrome Extension is a companion app to our main web app. With the extension you'll be able to save articles that you are currently reading right into your Focal account without having to switch back to the Focal app.
